title: Fox News Debates Kids, Psychedelic Salvation 5.6.21
itunes:title: Fox News Debates Kids, Psychedelic Salvation 5.6.21
description:
In episode 903, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Gangster Party Line co-host Greg Edwards to discuss Facebook not allowing Trump back for now, more Fox News nonsense, the Carter/Biden photo, how MDMA can help PTSD, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Facebook Oversight Board Will Not Restore Donald Trump Back on the Platform
  2. Brian Kilmeade Tries to Dunk on a 6th Grader for Saying Biden Is Better Than Trump
  3. The Wide Angle Lens
  4. Understanding the weird Biden-Carter photo could help you take better selfies
  5. A Psychedelic Drug Passes a Big Test for PTSD Treatment
  6. LISTEN: Don Quichotte (No Estan Aqui)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
